bwwExcerpt: Now [Jesus Christ Superstar] is ear-splittingly restored to its heavy metal rock origins in a thrilling production by Laurence Connor that uses the insignia of Occupy London, newsreel and video reportage and a game show voting process at the court of King Herod – is he a Lord or a Fraud, ladies and gentlemen, text this number – to renew the energy of political insurgency and repression. And while one may have had doubts about the wisdom of finding a new Jesus through a television talent contest
